mapper.select: select c.CD_NM as JBTTL_CD , B.STU_NO , B.USER_NM , B.USER_EML_ADDR , a.TEAM_JOIN_DT , B.USER_PHONENO , a.JBTTL_CD as cd_nm from TB_PRO_MEM a join TB_STU B on a.STU_NO = B.STU_NO join TB_CM_CD c on c.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(a.JBTTL_CD, 1, INSTR(a.JBTTL_CD, '-') - 1) and c.CD_VL = SUBSTR(a.JBTTL_CD, INSTR(a.JBTTL_CD, '-') + 1) and c.CD_TYPE_ID = 'P001' and c.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y' where a.PROJ_NO = #{projNo} ORDER BY a.JBTTL_CD ASC, b.USER_NM ASC
SELECT B.USER_NM , A.APPLY_DATE , B.STU_NO , A.PROJ_NO , A.APLY_CN , A.APLY_TECH FROM TB_JOIN_APLY A JOIN TB_STU B ON A.STU_NO = B.STU_NO WHERE A.PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
SELECT APLY_CN , APLY_TECH FROM TB_JOIN_APLY WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRO_MEM ( STU_NO , TEAM_JOIN_DT , JBTTL_CD , PROJ_NO) VALUES( #{stuNo} , sysdate , 'P001-8' , #{projNo})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CD_NM AS PROJ_STTS_CD ,A.PROJ_NM , A.PROJ_EXPLN , A.PROJ_STTR , A.PROJ_TECH , A.PROJ_STTS_CD AS CD_NM , a.PROJ_BGNG_DT , A.PROJ_DDLN_DT , A.PROJ_TNOPE FROM TB_PROJ A JOIN TB_CM_CD C ON C.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.PROJ_STTS_CD, 1, INSTR(A.PROJ_STTS_CD, '-') -1) AND C.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.PROJ_STTS_CD, INSTR(A.PROJ_STTS_CD, '-') + 1) AND C.CD_TYPE_ID = 'P002' AND C.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
SELECT PROJ_NM , PROJ_EXPLN , PROJ_STTS_CD , PROJ_TECH , PROJ_STTR , PROJ_BGNG_DT , PROJ_DDLN_DT FROM TB_PROJ WHERE PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
SELECT JBTTL_CD FROM TB_PRO_MEM WHERE STU_NO = #{userNo} AND PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
